channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Independent newspapers disappear as private investment firms take over

item.title: Jonathan Karl's "Retribution" reveals Hunter Biden's fury at Obama over viral stage moment
item.description: ABC News' Jonathan Karl reports in "Retribution: Donald Trump and the Campaign That Changed America," out next Tuesday, that Hunter Biden was furious ...

item.title: MAGA targets Disney, Netflix in cancellation spree
item.description: MAGA is on a cancellation spree , targeting marquee entertainment and tech companies with boycotts over comments or content the right deems inappropri...

item.title: Maine Dem Senate candidate embraced "antifa supersoldier" label
item.description: Graham Platner , the Maine Democratic Senate candidate backed by Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.), wrote in 2020 that he had an "antifa supersoldier" label...

item.title: Which states love candy corn — and which hate it

item.title: Biden completes a course of radiation therapy for prostate cancer
item.description: Former president’s spokesperson confirms Biden “rang the bell,” a tradition in cancer facilities to mark major milestones for patients, at the Philade...

item.title: Trump can deploy National Guard troops to Portland, appeals court says
item.description: Oregon attorney general urges the full appeals court to review the decision, while governor says “fight is not over.”

item.title: White House begins demolishing East Wing facade to build Trump’s ballroom
item.description: The president had claimed construction of the $250 million ballroom wouldn’t ‘interfere’ with the existing White House structure.

item.title: Marines investigating errant live-fire blast over California’s I-5
item.description: Artillery rounds also were launched over the freeway during a rehearsal for the demonstration attended by Vice President JD Vance and Defense Secretar...

item.title: Trump touts rare-earths deal, submarine pact with Australia ahead of Xi meeting
item.description: The White House has criticized China’s efforts to limit access to materials and minerals needed for manufacturing.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
